definition: to put on/to wear (mouthguard, contact lenses, hearing aid etc)
to join/to fit/to mate/to mix/to match/to deserve/to make up (a prescription)/to allocate
to put on or wear (glasses, hat, gloves etc)/to respect/to bear/to support

sentences.english: If they are wearing the glasses normally prescribed for myopia, their vision will deteriorate.
sentences.chinese: 如果他们正常地配戴近视眼睛，他们的视力会恶化。

sentences.english: Could the high-oxygen SCL be worn overnight safely?
sentences.chinese: 高透氧SCL过夜配戴是否安全？

sentences.english: Wearing lower degree convex lens can reduce incidence rate of myopia in primary school students.
sentences.chinese: 配戴低度凸透镜可降低小学生近视的发生率。

sentences.english: The quality of assembled spectacles directly influences the health of wearers.
sentences.chinese: 配装眼镜质量的好坏直接影响眼镜配戴者的健康。

sentences.english: Once detected, the wearers are swarmed.
sentences.chinese: 一旦检测到，配戴者都蜂拥。

sentences.english: You have a legal obligation to wear or use the eye protection provided in accordance with regulations.
sentences.chinese: 你有法律义务按照规定配戴或使用护目装置。

sentences.english: There should be metal gloves provided for electric scissors and electric saws operators. Refer to attachment.
sentences.chinese: 剪和电锯的操作者应配戴金属手套作保护。

sentences.english: Contact lens wearers should consult their doctor before use.
sentences.chinese: 隐形眼镜配戴者使用前应咨询医生。

sentences.english: You can see how women wear the hairpins here.
sentences.chinese: 从这里可以看到早期妇女是如何配戴和使用发簪。

sentences.english: Now many nearsighted patient wear contact lenses.
sentences.chinese: 现在不少近视患者配戴隐形眼镜。

sentences.english: Which shape is chosen is entirely dependent upon the shape and size of an individual's face.
sentences.chinese: 选择那种形状全取决于配戴者的脸型和大小。

sentences.english: Always wear a helmet that fits properly.
He is a tall man with glasses.
sentences.chinese: 他是一个宥配戴眼睛高大的人。

sentences.english: Extended-wear contact lenses allow the eye to breathe better.
sentences.chinese: 延长配戴隐形眼镜，让眼睛呼吸更好。

sentences.english: It was uncertain if fit-testing procedure was required for wearing N95 respirators.
sentences.chinese: 配戴N95口罩是否需要进行适合性检测仍有待商榷。

sentences.english: Conclusion Wearing lower degree convex lens can reduce incidence rate of myopia in primary school students.
sentences.chinese: 结论配戴低度凸透镜可降低小学生近视的发生率。

definition: to wear (as accessories)/carry at the waist
